Header: The Prime Minister congratulates Bangladeshi PM on election victory
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe has congratulated Sheikh Hasina on her party’s victory in Bangladesh’s general election. PM Wickremesinghe says Sri Lanka and Bangladesh have enjoyed warm and cordial relations for considerable period of time, and it is his fervent hope that these long-lasting bonds that bind the two nations will reach new heights in the coming years. The PM has stated that as Hasina commences a fresh tenure, he wishes to reassure the continued friendship and solidarity with Bangladesh.
